articles.title: Boston’s homicide rate increases 30% from 2024, from 24 killings to 31
articles.description:
2025’s 31 homicides is still the lowest in the last two decades, excluding 2024, Boston Police Commissioner Michael Cox said.

The post Boston’s homicide rate increases 30% from 2024, from 24 killings to 31 appeared first on Boston.com.
